common.unauthorizedChange: If you did not make this change, please check your account details and contact us at <link1/> if you believe someone has madean unauthorized change.
common.contactUs: Please contact us at <link1/> for more information.

accountDeleted.deleteSorry: You deleted your {{appName}} account and we are very sorry about that. We hope that you will return to us again.

defaultCardChange.ourRecords: Our records show that you have updated your billing information. If this is correct, then you are all set!

fdInvite.permission: {inviterFirstName} has given you permission to contribute, comment and chat with other members of the {fdName}

pmtDeclined.notSuccessful: Your payment for {planDescription} was not successful
pmtDeclined.declined: It seems like your payment, made on {paymentDate} for {paymentAmount}, was declined. This could be due to a change in your card number or your card expiring, cancelation of your credit card, or the bank not recognizing the payment and taking action to prevent it.
pmtDeclined.checkCard: Please check your card information on your Billing page or contact support team.
